languages.text: После того, как Адептус Арбитес были объявлены вне закона во всем Просторе, кто-то из них сдался на милость Вольного Торговца, другие спрятались, третьи погибли при сопротивлении, а некоторые попытались объединиться, со временем превратившись в банду пиратов "Лекс Войдис". Они сеяли ужас и разрушение на мирах династии фон Валанциус, прикрываясь стремлением вернуть верховенство закона.

After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.
languages.original_text: После того, как Адептус Арбитес были объявлены вне закона во всем Просторе, кто-то из них сдался на милость Вольного Торговца, другие спрятались, третьи погибли при сопротивлении, а некоторые попытались объединиться, со временем превратившись в банду пиратов "Лекс Войдис". Они сеяли ужас и разрушение на мирах династии фон Валанциус, прикрываясь стремлением вернуть верховенство закона.

traits.locale_text: After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, some of them surrendered to the Rogue Trader while others went into hiding, and still others either died while offering resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of seeking to restore the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on von Valancius worlds.

After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, some of them surrendered to the Rogue Trader while others went into hiding, and still others either died while offering resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of seeking to restore the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on von Valancius worlds.

After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

languages.text: Nachdem die Adeptus Arbites in der gesamten Ausdehnung geächtet waren, ergaben sich einige ihrer Mitglieder {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}, während viele andere untertauchten. Der Rest starb entweder bei Widerstandsversuchen oder versuchte, sich zusammenzutun, was letztlich zu der Piratenbande Lex Voidis führte. Unter dem Vorwand, Recht und Gesetz wiederherzustellen, sorgten sie für Schrecken und Zerstörung auf zahllosen Valancius-Welten.
languages.original_text: After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem die Adeptus Arbites in der gesamten Ausdehnung geächtet waren, ergaben sich einige ihrer Mitglieder {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}, während viele andere untertauchten. Der Rest starb entweder bei Widerstandsversuchen oder versuchte, sich zusammenzutun, was letztlich zu der Piratenbande Lex Voidis führte. Unter dem Vorwand, Recht und Gesetz wiederherzustellen, sorgten sie für Schrecken und Zerstörung auf zahllosen Valancius-Welten.

languages.text: Bien que quelques membres de l'Adeptus Arbites, désormais proscrit dans les Étendues, se soient livrés {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, la majorité préféra se cacher. Quant aux autres, ceux qui ne moururent pas dans de vaines tentatives de résistance se regroupèrent pour finalement former la bande de pirates connue sous le nom de Lex Voidis. Sous prétexte de rétablir l'état de droit, ils semèrent la terreur et la destruction sur d'innombrables mondes de la dynastie von Valancius.
languages.original_text: After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

traits.locale_text: Bien que quelques membres de l'Adeptus Arbites, désormais proscrit dans les Étendues, se soient livrés {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, la majorité préféra se cacher. Quant aux autres, ceux qui ne moururent pas dans de vaines tentatives de résistance se regroupèrent pour finalement former la bande de pirates connue sous le nom de Lex Voidis. Sous prétexte de rétablir l'état de droit, ils semèrent la terreur et la destruction sur d'innombrables mondes de la dynastie von Valancius.

languages.text: 当行商浪人宣判科罗努斯扩区法务部为非法组织后，一部分人投靠了行商浪人，还有一部分人就此隐姓埋名。其余的人要么在反抗的过程中被击毙，要么联合起来。最终，那些活下来的人结成了新的海盗团伙，自称“虚空法务部”。这些海盗打着恢复帝国律法的幌子，给冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的众多世界带来了恐怖与毁灭。
languages.original_text: After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

traits.locale_text: 当行商浪人宣判科罗努斯扩区法务部为非法组织后，一部分人投靠了行商浪人，还有一部分人就此隐姓埋名。其余的人要么在反抗的过程中被击毙，要么联合起来。最终，那些活下来的人结成了新的海盗团伙，自称“虚空法务部”。这些海盗打着恢复帝国律法的幌子，给冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的众多世界带来了恐怖与毁灭。

languages.text: Con la expulsión del Adeptus Arbites de toda la Extensión, algunos de sus miembros se rindieron ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, mientras que otros se ocultaron. El resto murió resistiéndose o intentó unirse en lo que acabó conociéndose como la banda pirata Lex Vacuis. Bajo el pretexto de restaurar el orden y la ley, sembraron el terror y la devastación en innumerables mundos von Valancius.
languages.original_text: After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

traits.locale_text: Con la expulsión del Adeptus Arbites de toda la Extensión, algunos de sus miembros se rindieron ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, mientras que otros se ocultaron. El resto murió resistiéndose o intentó unirse en lo que acabó conociéndose como la banda pirata Lex Vacuis. Bajo el pretexto de restaurar el orden y la ley, sembraron el terror y la devastación en innumerables mundos von Valancius.

languages.text: 高等裁定局がエクスパンス全域で非合法化された後、その一部のメンバーはローグトレーダーに降伏し、多くは潜伏した。残りの者たちは抵抗のために戦死するか、結束を図ろうと試み、最終的にはレックス・ヴォイディスとして知られる海賊ギャングへとまとまった。彼らは法の支配を回復するという大義名分のもと、フォン・ヴァランシウスの多くの惑星に恐怖と破壊をもたらした。
languages.original_text: After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局がエクスパンス全域で非合法化された後、その一部のメンバーはローグトレーダーに降伏し、多くは潜伏した。残りの者たちは抵抗のために戦死するか、結束を図ろうと試み、最終的にはレックス・ヴォイディスとして知られる海賊ギャングへとまとまった。彼らは法の支配を回復するという大義名分のもと、フォン・ヴァランシウスの多くの惑星に恐怖と破壊をもたらした。

languages.text: Adeptus Arbites'in Enginlik genelinde yasa dışı ilan edilmesinin ardından mensuplarının bir kısmı Hür Tacir'e teslim olurken pek çoğu da yer altına çekildi. Geriye kalanlar, ya direniş gösterilerinde can verdi ya da güçlerini birleştirmeye çalışarak nihayetinde Lex Voidis olarak bilinen korsan çetesi çatısı altında bir araya geldi. Hukukun üstünlüğünü yeniden tesis etme bahanesiyle sayısız von Valancius dünyasını dehşete ve yıkıma boğdular.
languages.original_text: After the Adeptus Arbites were outlawed throughout the Expanse, a few of their members surrendered to the Rogue Trader, while many others went into hiding. The remainder either died in shows of resistance or made attempts to band together, eventually coalescing into the pirate gang known as the Lex Voidis. Under the pretext of restoring the rule of law, they unleashed horror and destruction on countless von Valancius worlds.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Arbites'in Enginlik genelinde yasa dışı ilan edilmesinin ardından, üyelerinin bir kısmı Hür Tacir'e teslim olurken pek çoğu da yer altına çekildi. Geriye kalanlar, ya direniş gösterilerinde can verdi ya da güçlerini birleştirmeye çalışarak nihayetinde Lex Voidis olarak bilinen korsan çetesi çatısı altında bir araya geldi. Hukukun üstünlüğünü yeniden tesis etme bahanesiyle sayısız von Valancius dünyasını dehşete ve yıkıma boğdular.
